mapper.insert: insert into x$ps_schema_table_statistics_io (table_schema, table_name, count_read, sum_number_of_bytes_read, sum_timer_read, count_write, sum_number_of_bytes_write, sum_timer_write, count_misc, sum_timer_misc) values (#{tableSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countRead,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sumNumberOfBytesRead,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sumTimerRead,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countWrite,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sumNumberOfBytesWrite,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sumTimerWrite,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countMisc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sumTimerMisc,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select table_schema, table_name, count_read, sum_number_of_bytes_read, sum_timer_read, count_write, sum_number_of_bytes_write, sum_timer_write, count_misc, sum_timer_misc from x$ps_schema_table_statistics_io
